availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Martin B. Debaun (Mercer County, Kentucky, hotel keeper and soldier.)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, hotel keeper and soldier. Kentucky native. Hotel keeper in Mercer County in 1863. Corporal of the 4th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from March 5, 1864, to August 17, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Mercer County, KY, August 1863, p. 10, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 634.
